column5: Hey All,  Can anyone direct me to a shop that repairs canvas boat covers? Mine ripped along a stitching at the end of last year. I was hoping to get one more season before I replace it.  I'm in the Whitby area  Thanks in advance
Port Perry Autoglass makes/repairs boat covers.

I have seen a cover that port Perry auto glass made and it was very nice.  However... I have also seen 2 wood/fibreglass repairs done by them.  They were poorly done bandaid repairs that came with ridiculously expensive bills.  They also scratched the windshield in my car while repairing a chip.  Good luck either way!
